title: S&P 500 Movers: XEC, RE - Nasdaq.com
text: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Everest Re Group topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 3.5%. Year to date, Everest Re Group registers a 11.5% gain.    makeArticleAd();  And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Cimarex Energy, trading down 4.0%. Cimarex Energy is lower by about 33.4% looking at the year to date performance.      Two other components making moves today are Wynn Resorts, trading down 3.9%, and Marketaxess Holdings, trading up 1.4% on the day.        VIDEO: S&P 500 Movers: XEC, RE
